document_data.mainbody:
Shields of the Watch were enchanted shields from the land of Shaar.
These small shields carried a +1 enchantment and offered additional defense, effectively becoming a +2 shield when wielded against humans.
Shields of the Watch were created as a tribute to a wemic group called the Watch. The groups true purpose was unknown however, many claimed that the wemics were weapon and information dealers. Human nomads learned to trust the Watch. However, by the , the Watch was gone, and the shields created in the wemic name found their from Shaar to the city of Neverwinter
